-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | example https request to read from jokes api
--   
--   See README on GitLab at
--   <a>https://github.com/frankhjung/haskell-jokes#readme</a>
@package Jokes
@version 0.3.1

module Jokes

-- | Read joke from web site. The Either type is used for error handling,
--   so we can return error message if something went wrong.
getJoke :: IO (Either String Joke)

-- | Print the setup and punchline of a joke.
tellJoke :: Joke -> String

-- | A response from the joke web site.
data Joke
Joke :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Int -> Joke

-- | type of joke
[_type] :: Joke -> Text

-- | setup the joke
[_setup] :: Joke -> Text

-- | punchline
[_punchline] :: Joke -> Text

-- | identifier
[_id] :: Joke -> Int
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Jokes.Joke
instance GHC.Show.Show Jokes.Joke
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Jokes.Joke
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Jokes.Joke
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Jokes.Joke
